verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> "Go <S%G5217><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pour out <S%G1632><s%> the seven bowls <S%G5357><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the earth! <S%G1093><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The first <S%G4413><s%> went, <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it became <S%G1096><s%> a harmful <S%G2556><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> sore <S%G1668><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the people <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who worshiped <S%G4352><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image. <S%G1504><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The third <S%G5154><s%> <S%G32><s%> poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the rivers <S%G4215><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1519><s%> springs <S%G4077><s%> of water, <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they became <S%G1096><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the waters <S%G5204><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You are <S%G1488><s%> righteous, <S%G1342><s%> who are <S%G5607><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who were, <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3741><s%> you Holy One, <S%G2962><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have judged <S%G2919><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> they poured <S%G1632><s%> out the blood <S%G129><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you have given <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> to drink. <S%G4095><s%> <S%G1063><s%> They <S%G1526><s%> deserve this. <S%G514><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G243><s%> the <S%G1537><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> true <S%G228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> are your <S%G4675><s%> judgments. <S%G2920><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> People <S%G444><s%> were scorched <S%G2739><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> heat, <S%G2738><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> people blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> plagues. <S%G4127><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They didn't <S%G3756><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> they blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> pains <S%G4192><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sores. <S%G1537><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They didn't <S%G3756><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The sixth <S%G1623><s%> <S%G32><s%> poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> river, <S%G4215><s%> the Euphrates. <S%G2166><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Its <S%G846><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> was dried up, <S%G3583><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> might be prepared <S%G2090><s%> for the kings <S%G935><s%> that come from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G2246><s%> sunrise. <S%G395><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> coming out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the dragon, <S%G1404><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the false prophet, <S%G5578><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> something like <S%G3664><s%> frogs; <S%G944><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> of demons, <S%G1142><s%> performing <S%G4160><s%> signs; <S%G4592><s%> which go forth <S%G1607><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> <S%G2532><s%> of the whole <S%G3650><s%> inhabited earth, <S%G3625><s%> to gather <S%G4863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> together for <S%G1519><s%> the war <S%G4171><s%> of that <S%G1565><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a thief. <S%G2812><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he <S%G3588><s%> who watches, <S%G1127><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> keeps <S%G5083><s%> his <S%G846><s%> clothes, <S%G2440><s%> so that he doesn't <S%G3363><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they see <S%G991><s%> his <S%G846><s%> shame. <S%G808><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He gathered <S%G4863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> which is called <S%G2564><s%> in Hebrew, <S%G1447><s%> Megiddo. <S%G717><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> was divided <S%G1096><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> parts, <S%G3313><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> of the nations <S%G1484><s%> fell. <S%G4098><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> was remembered <S%G3415><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> to her <S%G846><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the fierceness <S%G2372><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> wrath. <S%G3709><s%>
